content.rendered: The Harmony Collection is a must have for any fan of Hibiki whisky. Including three of the best age-statement whiskies from the Hibiki core range, it allows you to experience the masterful blends in all of their glory, while starting an impressive collection at the same time. Hibiki whisky is known to be one of the most balanced and flavourful blends in the world and this is highlighted by the astonishing number of awards they have picked up over the years.

excerpt.rendered:
This set includes:
Hibiki 12 Year Old
Hibiki 17 Year Old
Hibiki 21 Year Old .
Blended: Yes
Weight: 6 Kg
